events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but it does not fit at all. I would like to request a refund for this item as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to dissatisfaction with the purchased product size.
The case has been assigned to a customer service agent specializing in refund processing to handle this request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the jacket that did not fit.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm whether the product has been opened or worn, so we can proceed with the refund process?
The order number is 123456789. I haven’t worn the jacket yet, and the tags are still attached. Please advise on the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund once you send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label that we will email to you shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited to your original payment method in 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that you received your refund and that everything is now resolved to your satisfaction.
As you confirmed receipt of the refund, we are closing this case. Please feel free to contact us again for any future assistance.
